languages.text: {n}Соломон окидывает поле боя тяжелым взглядом и резко разворачивается к вам.{/n} "Меняем тактику — надо завалить места прибытия подкрепления. Видите противовесы с тросами? Они держат контейнеры в воздухе. Если избавиться от противовесов, контейнеры упадут и перекроют проходы. Кто-то заберется в это подобие танка и будет стрелять по нужным точкам, остальные активируют систему загрузки снарядов через когитаторы и будут сдерживать врагов. Выберите, кто займет танк".

{n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон окидывает поле боя тяжелым взглядом и резко разворачивается к вам.{/n} "Меняем тактику — надо завалить места прибытия подкрепления. Видите противовесы с тросами? Они держат контейнеры в воздухе. Если избавиться от противовесов, контейнеры упадут и перекроют проходы. Кто-то заберется в это подобие танка и будет стрелять по нужным точкам, остальные активируют систему загрузки снарядов через когитаторы и будут сдерживать врагов. Выберите, кто займет танк".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne observa el campo de batalla con gesto serio y se gira bruscamente hacia ti.{/n} «Cambio de táctica: debemos cortar el paso a sus refuerzos. ¿Ve esos cables y contrapesos? Son lo que mantiene elevados esos contenedores. Si eliminamos los contrapesos, los contenedores caerán y obstruirán los pasadizos. Alguien tendrá que subir a esta especie de tanque y disparar a los objetivos mientras los demás activan el sistema de carga de proyectiles mediante los cogitadores y mantienen a raya a los enemigos. Tendrá que decidir quién pilota el tanque».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne observa el campo de batalla con gesto serio y se gira bruscamente hacia ti.{/n} «Cambio de táctica: debemos cortar el paso a sus refuerzos. ¿Ve esos cables y contrapesos? Son lo que mantiene elevados esos contenedores. Si eliminamos los contrapesos, los contenedores caerán y obstruirán los pasadizos. Alguien tendrá que subir a esta especie de tanque y disparar a los objetivos mientras los demás activan el sistema de carga de proyectiles mediante los cogitadores y mantienen a raya a los enemigos. Tendrá que decidir quién pilota el tanque».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙表情严肃地看着战场，随后目光迅速转向你。{/n}“改变计划，我们必须切断敌人的增援路线。看到那些钢索和配重了吗？那些集装箱是靠着这些东西吊起来的。只要把配重弄掉，集装箱就会掉下来，堵住通道。必须有人爬进这辆类似于坦克的东西里面，向那些目标开火。剩下的人负责使用沉思者激活火炮装填系统，拖住敌人。你来决定驾驶坦克的人选吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙表情严肃地看着战场，随后目光迅速转向你。{/n}“改变计划，我们必须切断敌人的增援路线。看到那些钢索和配重了吗？那些集装箱是靠着这些东西吊起来的。只要把配重弄掉，集装箱就会掉下来，堵住通道。必须有人爬进这辆类似于坦克的东西里面，向那些目标开火。剩下的人负责使用沉思者激活火炮装填系统，拖住敌人。你来决定驾驶坦克的人选吧。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、真面目な顔つきで戦場を眺め、それから急にあなたの方を向いた。{/n}「戦略変更。敵の増援が到着する全ての地点を断たなければなりません。あのケーブルと釣り合いおもりが見えますか？あれがコンテナを宙に吊るしているのです。釣り合いおもりを取り除けば、コンテナが落ちて通路を塞ぎます。誰かがこのタンクもどきに乗り込んで敵を狙い撃ちし、残りの者は考算機を使ってシェル積み込み装置を稼働させ、敵を撃退します。誰がタンクに登るか決めてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、真面目な顔つきで戦場を眺め、それから急にあなたの方を向いた。{/n}「戦略変更。敵の増援が到着する全ての地点を断たなければなりません。あのケーブルと釣り合いおもりが見えますか？あれがコンテナを宙に吊るしているのです。釣り合いおもりを取り除けば、コンテナが落ちて通路を塞ぎます。誰かがこのタンクもどきに乗り込んで敵を狙い撃ちし、残りの者は考算機を使ってシェル積み込み装置を稼働させ、敵を撃退します。誰がタンクに登るか決めてください」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne jette un regard grave en direction du champ de bataille avant de se tourner brusquement vers vous.{/n} « Changement de plan : nous devons condamner tous les accès et ainsi les couper de leurs renforts. Vous voyez ces câbles et ces contrepoids ? À mon avis, ce sont eux qui maintiennent les conteneurs en suspension. Si nous nous débarrassons des contrepoids, les conteneurs tomberont et bloqueront les issues. Quelqu'un devra grimper dans cet ersatz de char et ouvrir le feu sur les cibles pendant que les autres activeront le système de chargement des obus à l'aide des cogitateurs tout en tenant l'ennemi en respect. À vous de choisir la personne la plus apte à piloter cet engin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne jette un regard grave en direction du champ de bataille avant de se tourner brusquement vers vous.{/n} « Changement de plan : nous devons condamner tous les accès et ainsi les couper de leurs renforts. Vous voyez ces câbles et ces contrepoids ? À mon avis, ce sont eux qui maintiennent les conteneurs en suspension. À vous de choisir la personne la plus apte à piloter cet engin. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, savaş alanına vahim bir bakış atıp hızla sana dönüyor.{/n} "Taktik değişikliği: Takviyelerinin varış noktalarını kesmeliyiz. Şu kablolar ve dengeleyiciler var ya? Konteynerleri havada tutuyorlar. Dengeleyicileri ortadan kaldırırsak konteynerler düşer, geçitler kapanır. Birisi bu tank benzeri şeye binecek, diğerleri kavramsayarları kullanarak mermi yükleme sistemini etkinleştirecek ve düşmanları oyalayacak Tankı kimin kumanda edeceğini seçmeli."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."

Konteynerleri havada tutuyorlar. Dengeleyicileri ortadan kaldırırsak konteynerler düşer, geçitler kapanır. Birisi bu tank benzeri şeye binecek, diğerleri kavramsayarları kullanarak mermi yükleme sistemini etkinleştirecek ve düşmanları oyalayacak Tankı kimin kumanda edeceğini seçmeli."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wirft einen ernsten Blick auf das Schlachtfeld und wendet sich dann abrupt dir zu.{/n} "Strategiewechsel. Wir müssen alle ihre Ankunftspunkte vom Nachschub abschneiden. Seht Ihr diese Kabel und Gegengewichte? Sie halten die Behälter in ihrer Position. Wenn wir die Gegengewichte entfernen, fallen die Behälter runter und blockieren den Weg. Jemand muss in diesen Panzer klettern und das Feuer auf diese Ziele eröffnen, während der Rest mittels der Cogitatoren das Ladesystem für die Granaten aktiviert und die Feinde in Schach hält. Wer soll den Panzer bedienen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts a grave look over the battlefield, then turns sharply to you.{/n} "A change of tactics: we must cut off all the arrival points for their reinforcements. See those cables and counterweights? They're what's keeping the containers suspended. We get rid of the counterweights, and the containers will fall and block the passages. Someone will have to climb into this semblance of a tank and open fire on these targets while the rest activate the shell loading system using the cogitators and hold off the enemies. Choose who will man the tank."
